title: CUET Staff Association holds farewell, reception
body: The farewell of retirees, reception of past executive committee and the awarding of Election Commission of the Staff Association of Chittagong University of Engineering and Technology were held on the campus on Sunday. CUET vice-chancellor Professor Mahmud Abdul Matin Bhuiyan was chief guest at the event organised at CUET central auditorium. The special guests were the chief election commissioner of the Staff Association Election 2025 and Department of Petroleum and Mining Engineering head Professor Abu Sadat Muhammad Sayem, vice-president of the teachers association and professor of mathematics Ujjwal Kumar Deb and officers association president Syed Mohammad Ikram. In addition, chief engineer Md Sirajul Islam and retired employee Raji Ahmed also spoke. The event was presided over by CUET Staff Association president Mohammad Jamal Uddin and the address of welcome was delivered by its general secretary Priyatosh Chakraborty. The event was moderated by Abdul Al Hannan and Bishwajit Bhattacharya, said a press release.
